title: What is the best smart alarm clock device? I want to wake up in a light sleep phase. - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t think this is considered “smart” in that it tracks your sleep or anything, but I love my Philips Wake-Up Light. I can’t even begin to tell you how much easier it is to wake up with this clock than without. But don’t just take my word for it… read the reviews.

If you want to wake up in the light sleep phase then you can buy a smart alarm clocks which will help you to wake up. There are thousands of website where you can it online. a few day ago i have also bought a smart alarm clocks from online website.
